mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO finance_record_tb ( method, type, transaction_number, money, status, create_date, update_date, account_id ) VALUES ( #{method}, #{type}, #{transactionNumber}, #{money}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{accountId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE finance_record_tb
method=#{method},
type=#{type},
transaction_number=#{transactionNumber},
money=#{money},
status=#{status},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate},
account_id=#{accountId},
WHERE finance_record_id=#{financeRecordId}
mapper.select: SELECT finance_record_id, method, type, transaction_number, money, status, create_date, update_date, account_id FROM finance_record_tb WHERE finance_record_id=#{financeRecordId}
